name: Mini Golf Tycoon (ALPHA DEMO)
description:
THIS IS IN REALLY EARLY ALPHA, BE CAREFUL!

Build a mini-golf course! To get started, click "New Hole" in the build menu and select a piece with the numbers. Press "T" to switch camera modes. To "Play" your hole press "P" and it will put you in first person. Then press "E" to drop a ball and click + hold to shoot it in the direction you are looking. There is no goal yet, just a little physics, but soon there will be! Watch the devlogs here:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLy354RIS_cav8NQ7vnqjIOD0YLUqUBlSe

Have fun!
